short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Counts ChatGPT messages and tracks water usage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The TrackGPT extension enables you to keep track of how much water ChatGPT needs to consume in order to operate based on your location. With TrackGPT, you can set a weekly consumption limit. TrackGPT provides real-time feedback of your ChatGPT usage and how much water is required for your weekly usage habits.

TrackGPT runs directly in your browser, and your data is stored locally and never shared with or accessible by anyone but you.
